t: Ryka Devotion Plus 3 - Women's Review | Tested
Ryka Walking Shoes Review - Allyn Lewis
s: October 14, 2021 - Ryka shoes are designed for women, which really sets them a part from other sneakers brands out there. More specifically, the construction of the shoe is crafted with the unique build, foot shape, and muscle movement women have. Ryka sneakers have a roomier forefoot and narrower heel.
